txt.en: From this watch-post you can make out the old gardens of Vâr Nuchur
'Bah! Gundabad has seen no respect from the Orcs who occupied it! We have much to repair.'
The middle of Máttugard recedes into darkness, the pit of Ablak-zibdîn
From the watch-post you can just make out the Shalakibal, the old Water-square
'Welcome to Maergrind, the Noble Gate of Máttugard.'
The path from Maergrind to the Gates of Gundabad are well guarded
Maergrind, the Noble Gate of Máttugard, can be found in Gundabad.\n\nYou should familiarize yourself with the foothold at Maergrind.
Prince Ingór can be found at Maergrind in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Prince Ingór.

'Welcome, [placeholder], to Maergrind, the Noble Gate of Máttugard. From this encampment we will bravely work to retake Gundabad!\n\n'Have a look around the Noble Gate, for it will give you a good view of much of Máttugard from here. If you are to lead any expeditions further into Gundabad, you will first need to get your bearings!'
Prince Ingór has established a foothold at Maergrind in Máttugard.
Talk to Prince Ingór at Maergrind
'I see you have explored Maergrind and peered toward the future of what awaits us! Now, onward! The expedition awaits!'
